knimeNode.name: Patterns between events
knimeNode.shortDescription: Extracts patterns between events (events represented as strings) in an apposite column.

fullDescription.intro: Extracts patterns from the input table located between string "xxxx", where xxxx is the name of the event (for example "split").
fullDescription.option: Select the input column containing the name of the event where you to split the original time series.
Name of the events where to split the original time series.
Name of the column from which patterns will be extracted.
